short_summary: A bid for Thermogravimetric Analyzer for delivery to DND \\u2013 Quality Engineering Testing Establishment, Gatineau, QC.
description: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. This requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only. Bids must be submitted by e-mail only to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
full_summary:
# **Thermogravimetric Analyzer - Solicitation Notice (English)**

**Notice Reference #: cb-550-79471296**
**Amendment #: 7**
**Solicitation #: W8476-246796/A**
**Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-25T14:00:00**

**Summary**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for the procurement of one (1) Thermogravimetric Analyzer (TGA) delivery to the DND – Quality Engineering Testing Establishment in Gatineau, QC.

**Unspsc Code**: 41110000 - Measuring and observing and testing instruments

**Notice Details:unta**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any aspect of this procurement.

**Electronic Submission of Bids**: This procurement requires electronic submission of bids. Please review the Electronic Submission of Bids section in the solicitation document for details.

**Submission Address**: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Required Delivery Date**: 8 weeks after receipt of order (ARO)

**Solicitation Amendments**: The solicitation has been amended four times and all amendments are attached to this notice.

**Required Documents**: 

- Amendment 004 (attached)
- Amendment 003 (attached)
- Amendment 002 (attached)
- Amendment 001 (attached)
- Original Solicitation (attached)

**Procurement Details**

This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) using competitive open bidding. The selection criteria is based on Lowest Price.

**Trade Agreements**: The solicitation is subject to a number of trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Regions of Opportunity**: This procurement is open globally. The delivery region is Canada, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence Headquarters
**Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive
   **Ottawa**
   Ontario
   K1A 0K2
   Canada

You can contact Dong Le at **dong.le@forces.gc.ca** or (999) 999-9999 for more information. 
Please let me know if the rewritten text has any errors or inconsistencies.
